In potentials possessing a minimum, reheating can occur in two distinct ways: (i) per-
turbatively (slowly), (ii) rapidly – via a parametric resonance. Which of these two ways is
realized depends upon the nature of the coupling between the inﬂaton and bosons/fermions.

on the subject of reheating.
